text: Lee Roy West (November 26, 1929 â€“ April 24, 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the Senior United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Western District of Oklahoma. He was nominated to the court by President Jimmy Carter in 1979. West was born in Clayton, Oklahoma. West died on April 24, 2020 in Muskogee, Oklahoma at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Lawyers from Oklahoma Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Oklahoma Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Lee Roy West
